abstract: The restaurants that Sam Sifton reviewed in his tenure as The Times's critic, broken down by star rating.
snippet: The restaurants that Sam Sifton reviewed in his tenure as The Times's critic, broken down by star rating.
lead_paragraph: The restaurants that Sam Sifton reviewed in his tenure as The Times's critic, broken down by rating. A handful - M. Wells, Mia Dona, Choptank, Motorino Williamsburg and Xiao Ye - have closed. His final review as the critic, on Per Se, appears this week.
